entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
